events.name: Sustainability of the Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain (LIBSC)
events.wd_label: Sustainability of the Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain (LIBSC)
events.wd_description: This event explores the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, highlighting the importance of transparency, evaluation criteria, barriers, and recommendations for improving sustainability assessments.
events.description: This event explores the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, highlighting the importance of transparency, evaluation criteria, barriers, and recommendations for improving sustainability assessments.

events.name: Sustainability aspects identification
events.wd_description: Identifying 29 sustainability aspects of the lithium-ion battery supply chain through a mixed-methods approach including literature review, expert interviews, workshops, and Delphi study.
events.description: Identifying 29 sustainability aspects of the lithium-ion battery supply chain through a mixed-methods approach including literature review, expert interviews, workshops, and Delphi study.

events.name: ironmental aspects
events.wd_description: Identifying environmental aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, including GHG emissions and circularity indicators.
events.description: Identifying environmental aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, including GHG emissions and circularity indicators.

events.name: ial aspects
events.wd_description: Identifying social aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on human rights and safety issues.
events.description: Identifying social aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on human rights and safety issues.

events.name: ernance aspects
events.wd_description: Identifying governance aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Identifying governance aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: nomic aspects
events.wd_description: Identifying economic aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, with a lower priority compared to other dimensions.
events.description: Identifying economic aspects for the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain, with a lower priority compared to other dimensions.

events.name: Barriers identification
events.wd_description: Identifying 30 barriers for establishing transparency and implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Identifying 30 barriers for establishing transparency and implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: nsparency barriers
events.wd_description: Identifying barriers to transparency in the lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on interactions and relationships among supply chain tiers.
events.description: Identifying barriers to transparency in the lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on interactions and relationships among supply chain tiers.

events.name: lementation barriers
events.wd_description: Identifying barriers to implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Identifying barriers to implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Prioritization and evaluation
events.wd_description: Prioritizing the identified sustainability aspects and evaluating the barriers using a Delphi study and expert judgment.
events.description: Prioritizing the identified sustainability aspects and evaluating the barriers using a Delphi study and expert judgment.

events.name: ect prioritization
events.wd_description: Prioritizing the 29 identified sustainability aspects based on their importance and ease of implementation.
events.description: Prioritizing the 29 identified sustainability aspects based on their importance and ease of implementation.

events.name: rier evaluation
events.wd_description: Evaluating the 30 identified barriers for implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Evaluating the 30 identified barriers for implementing sustainability assessments in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Policy recommendations
events.wd_description: Providing policy recommendations to improve the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain based on the study's findings.
events.description: Providing policy recommendations to improve the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain based on the study's findings.

events.name: ulatory suggestions
events.wd_description: Developing regulatory suggestions to address the identified barriers and improve sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Developing regulatory suggestions to address the identified barriers and improve sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: ategic initiatives
events.wd_description: Formulating strategic initiatives to enhance sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Formulating strategic initiatives to enhance sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Circularity indicators
events.description: Indicators that measure the degree to which materials are reused and recycled within the LIBSC, highlighting the importance of circular economy principles

events.name: Cross tier information sharing barriers
events.description: Barriers that arise from the need for information exchange between different tiers of the supply chain, affecting the overall transparency and sustainability assessments

events.name: Leveraging existing sustainability standards
events.description: Recommendations to use and evaluate compliance with existing sustainability standards as a feasible approach to address the complexity of sustainability aspects in the LIBSC
